about_the_game:
Game Introduction:

This is a pseudo reality visual novel that will advance the plot in the first person. The game contains elements of horror, gore, negative emotions, and is not suitable for children or those with weak psychological resilience.

Background introduction:

I am a Social livestock who almost died suddenly due to overtime in a big city. I chose to return to my hometown's fourth tier small town and work in an e-commerce company.

However, here wages are low, consumption is high, pressure is high, and there is no hope for life, making people doubt their existence and value, and can only escape reality through fantasy.

After graduating from college, I spent my life in failure, calling myself a Social livestock, loser, or loser by any name.

After another frustrating and helpless overtime, my spirit reached the brink of collapse. Those beings who originated from dark and profound fantasies came, and in this fantasy, a girl who is unique to me was born. She seems a little different?

Waking up on another weekday morning, checking my phone, I have good news and bad news.

Good news: You don't have to work today.

Bad news: The company has gone bankrupt and I am unemployed.

Losing a job brought temporary relief and freedom, but this short period of time brought about a different kind of change.

The cruelty of reality and the uncertainty of the future drive me to keep moving forward. In one choice after another, will I face darkness, terror, the unknown, death, or warmth, hope, happiness, and light?

Character Introduction:

Fantasy Girl - Born from the dark and profound imagination in my heart, her liking for me has reached a pathological level and she has a strong possessiveness.

First snow - a girl who has been failing the civil service and postgraduate entrance exams after graduating from university. She has a gentle personality, is understanding, and has good cooking skills, but is currently in a low point in her life.

White night - a wealthy heiress from a large company, chooses to run away from home for some reason. She is arrogant and unreasonable, but after getting to know her well, she will discover a different person.

Reminder again, this game is not suitable for children and those with weak psychological resilience

If you have any questions or want to communicate, you can send a private message to 庆庆侠 on Bilibili
